author: rdonkin
msg: Only assemble module should assemble. JSIEVE-48 https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/JSIEVE-48

author: rdonkin
msg: Remove assembles from top level. ATM Maven assembly has issues with complex multiproject assemblies caused by the parent lifecycle completing before any children. JSIEVE-48 https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/JSIEVE-48

author: gertv
msg: SMX4-226: Avoid use of ActiveMQ ShutDownHook for embedded broker

author: sccomer
msg: this is a version of 1.1 stream (trunk) which allows for dynamic mixin. it include a ComboValueFactory and a ComboStub which allow adding on more services handled by a single connection at runtime.
it isn't really meant to be mainlined in this form, this is more of a prototype for demonstration purposes.
